name: Heartaker (Eduardo Spinetto)
description:
Inspired by the history of Mrs Winchester, get into the mannor, just to see how can you manage to get out of there. Controls:
  •  W- A-S- D / UP-DOWN-LEFT-RIGT : MOVE
  • TAB: Invetory
  • Space: Interact / Use / Equip
  • R: Reload
  • Ctrl: Shoot
  • ESC: Pause
  • F6: Back to Menu
  • F7: Enter Fulscreen mode (Higly recommended)
Features:
  • Top view survival horror
  • Shoot your enemies or run, you choose!
  • Discover the hidden secrets of the mannor
  • Classic inventory system
  • Use your items carefuly
  • Find all the weapons
  • Explore the interiors, and the gardens
Notes:
  • This is an alpha build, expect bugs and issues, please report any if found.
  • All assets are either made by me, or under CC-BY-SA 3.0 / GNU GPL 3.0,  PUBLIC DOMAIN OR USED WITH PERMISSION
  • The content is subject to changes, this is not the definitive game
  • Feel free to contact me if you need help, give feedback, or if you have any question (:
  • If you liked it and you want to support the project, please consider donating, you'll find how in the credits, or contact me!
